Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy and now doing radiation . my concern and is taking Armidex or nto. the side effectof this drug ar not user friendly
Posts.Title: Ductal Cancer

Posts.Content: I have also debated with my self about taking Arimidex. the side effects are tough . i have been on it a little over a month and i experience nausea and very severe tiredness.  I am trying to  walk a couple of times a week to boost my energy level.  I am going to visit a health food store for vitamins.
Posts.Title: Scared to begin Arimidex
